# Change Log
The prelude

## Upcoming
### Added
- one added
- emphasize *this `change`*

### Changed
- this has changed with `linline code`.
- this item continues
  in the next line

### Removed
- gone :(

### Deprecated
- for once-stable features removed in upcoming releases.

### Fixed
- for any bug fixes.

### Security
- to invite users to upgrade in case of vulnerabilities.
